SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, H.* FROM (SELECT * FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HOSP_DEL_FL='N' ORDER BY HOSP_NO DESC)H) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT HOSP_NM,LOCATION2,PHONE,OPENING_TIME,CLOSING_TIME,HOSP_INFO,VIEW_COUNT,HOSP_FACILITY FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HOSP_NO=? AND HOSP_DEL_FL='N'
UPDATE HOSPITAL SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT +1 WHERE HOSP_NO = ?
INSERT INTO HOSPITAL VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?, ?)
